meta.title: Trinity Basin Preparatory School Fort Worth & Dallas - Public Charter School

meta.content: Trinity Basin Preparatory School Fort Worth & Dallas - Public Charter School
Founded in 1998, Trinity Basin Preparatory is a free public charter school in Fort Worth & Dallas, striving to provide a well-rounded & rigorous education to students.
Trinity Basin Preparatory School Fort Worth & Dallas - Public Charter School
Founded in 1998, Trinity Basin Preparatory is a free public charter school in Fort Worth & Dallas, striving to provide a well-rounded & rigorous education to students.

p.strong: Trinity Basin Preparatory is committed to keeping our students, staff and families safe. We are navigating this uncharted territory with safety as our number one concern.

div.p: Please continue to check for new district updates regarding COVID-19 below.All required instruction while students are at home can be found under TBP At-Home Learning below.

div.p: Please click here if you are interested in job openings in Mesquite.

figure.blockquote: I like TBP because they focus on discipline, love the way teachers teach our children and the classes TBP offers to parents through Parent University.

New to the State of Texas, moved from MA and was concerned about my kids starting a new school. TBP was so welcoming to our family. My 3rd grader has blossomed and I see great changes in her academically & socially. My Kindergarten has made many friends & enjoys going to school.

My children started in 2018 when Ledbetter campus opened and I feel very satisfied with the professionalism of the staff. The attention and kindness from teachers is awesome. We are very satisfied to belong to TBP!

My experience with Trinity Basin Preparatory has been great! In her first school year she learned a lot, her confidence increased greatly and she is now more social. She has grown a lot academically. TBP has a lot of expectations and thats great.
figure.figcaption: Maria L Garcia, Ledbetter campus parent

div.h1: Your Child. Your Choice. Our Mission.
div.h3: Inspiring every student to do more, expect more and be more.

figure.blockquote: We thrive on excellence. We challenge our kids on a daily basis to exceed their maximum potential and push them to achieve every day.
Being a Trinity Basin Titan is being a leader. A Titan is always committed to his or her studies every day.

div.p: Trinity Basin Preparatory is a free public charter school that opened in 1998. We now serve over 3,850 students by providing a safe, disciplined learning environment designed to meet all individual academic, physical and emotional needs.

Trinity Basin does not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sex, or disability in providing education services, activities, and programs, including vocational programs, in accordance with Title VI of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, as amended; Title IX of the Educational Amendments of 1972; and Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, as amended.
Contact Us |Careers |Enroll Now | Anonymous Bullying Report
Board of Directors: Randal C. Shaffer Ken Petree Julia Gomez Dana Bickford Loren "Pepper" Hitchcock Mike Winemiller Frederick Brown
